duck: File system permissions - Most current file systems have methods of administering permissions or access rights to specific users and groups of users.
Permission (magazine) - Permission was one of the largest gothic magazines of the 1990s.
Historical Permission Notice and Disclaimer - The Historical Permission Notice and Disclaimer is an open source license, approved by the Open Source Initiative.
permission definition: the act of permitting.
Repair permissions - Repairing disk permissions is a troubleshooting activity commonly associated with the Mac OS X operating system.

Permission culture - Permission culture is a term often employed by Lawrence Lessig and other copyright activists to describe a society in which copyright restrictions are pervasive and enforced to the extent that a...
Permission marketing - Permission marketing is a term popularized by Seth Godin used in marketing in general and e-marketing specifically.

milestones: Mubarak refused permission to leave Egypt for treatment after heart attack
Dubai World refused permission to use QE2 as floating hotel in Cape Town
UK to get new nuclear power stations
Kansas School Board has copyright withheld over teaching Intelligent Design
Allegations that New Zealand school administers corporal punishment
Lesbians, heterosexuals banned from gay bar in Australia
Libya allows US oil company to return
US nationals arrested for alleged abduction of Haitian children
KLM flight to Mexico sent back by U.S. Homeland Security, inquiry follows
Musician David Byrne sues Florida governor over campaign song
U.S. Marines accused of assaulting Australian freed by U.S. military court
South Korean police clamp down on protests against US beef
Microsoft faults Google on its copyright protection practices
